segments.text: Yes . I'd like to open an account that enables me to draw money easily .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , in that case , I think a checking account may be more convenient for you . However , there's a service charge .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How much is the service charge ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sounds reasonable . Will 300 dollars be enough for a minimal deposit ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: More than enough . Please fill in this form .
segments.speaker: S1
